SongLyrics.JpnStr: ぼくはどうしたらいい?
SongLyrics.EngStr: What should I do?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 眠[ねむ]れない 夜[よる]がきて
SongLyrics.EngStr: A sleepless night has come.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 窓[まど]の外[そと]が 少[すこ]しオレンジに 変[か]わる
SongLyrics.EngStr: The outside of the window turns a little orange.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 昨日[きのう]見[み]た 映画[えいが]で
SongLyrics.EngStr: In the movie I saw yesterday,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 過[す]ぎていった 時代[じだい]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: The era that has passed by

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]のママやパパが 子供[こども]の頃[ころ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: When my mom and dad were children.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それは 世紀末[せいきまつ]のクリスマスイブ
SongLyrics.EngStr: That was Christmas Eve at the turn of the century.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]もが 愛[あい]したこの 街[まち]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: This town that everyone loved

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 知[し]らない 神様[かみさま]が 変[か]えてしまう
SongLyrics.EngStr: A god we don't know will change it.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: っていう 話[はなし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's the story.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ぼくはどうしたらいい?
SongLyrics.EngStr: What should I do?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 眠[ねむ]れない 夜[よる]が 増[ふ]え
SongLyrics.EngStr: Sleepless nights are increasing.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: テディベアとお 話[はなし]できそうだよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I feel like I can talk to my teddy bear.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 街[まち]は 光[ひかり]が 溢[あふ]れ
SongLyrics.EngStr: The town is overflowing with light.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 子供[こども]達[たち]の 足音[あしおと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The footsteps of children.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: カウントダウンがはじまった ほら
SongLyrics.EngStr: The countdown has begun, look.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それは 世紀末[せいきまつ]のクリスマスイブ
SongLyrics.EngStr: That was Christmas Eve at the turn of the century.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]が 愛[あい]していたあの 人[ひと]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: The person I loved.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 知[し]らない 神様[かみさま]が 変[か]えてしまった
SongLyrics.EngStr: A god we don't know has changed.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それは 世紀末[せいきまつ]のクリスマスイブ
SongLyrics.EngStr: That was Christmas Eve at the turn of the century.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]もが 愛[あい]したこの 街[まち]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: This town that everyone loved

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 知[し]らない 神様[かみさま]が 変[か]えてしまう
SongLyrics.EngStr: A god we don't know will change it.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: っていう 話[はなし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's the story.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それは 世紀末[せいきまつ]のクリスマスイブ
SongLyrics.EngStr: That was Christmas Eve at the turn of the century.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]が 愛[あい]していたあの 人[ひと]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: The person I loved.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 知[し]らない 神様[かみさま]が 変[か]えてしまった どうしてよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: A god we don't know has changed, why?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よ]が 明[あ]ける頃[ころ] 迎[むかえ]にゆくよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: When dawn breaks, I will go to welcome you.

ListVocab: カウントダウン-カウントダウン
クリスマスイブ-クリスマスイブ
できそうだ-できそうだ
